text: THE BLONDS IS A LUXURY APPAREL BRAND BASED IN NEW YORK CITY, CO-FOUNDED BY DESIGNER PHILLIPE BLOND AND CREATIVE DIRECTOR DAVID BLOND IN 2007. THE BLONDS ARE BEST KNOWN FOR CREATING COLLECTIONS WITH A GLAMOROUSLY OVER THE TOP REBELLIOUS TWIST.  INSPIRED BY MUSIC, FILM AND ART, THE BRAND UTILIZES AN ECLECTIC MIX OF TEXTILES AND EMBROIDERY TO CREATE HAND CRAFTED COUTURE GARMENTS THAT FOCUS ON ACCENTUATING THE HUMAN FORM.
